overview.heading: Lehigh Acres Virtual Office
overview.body: Lock in a prestigious business address in Lakewood Ranch without the high costs associated with a physical location. With Opus VO, you can position your business at the epicenter of Lakewood Ranch’s vibrant community, all while being mindful of your bottom line. For pivotal meetings or client consultations, our state-of-the-art conference rooms are at your disposal.  Enlist with Opus VO in Lakewood Ranch, and you also earn the service of a professional live receptionist who will be a key member of your team. They will be committed to offering top-notch, tailored customer service, ensuring that every client touchpoint is in harmony with your brand values. Leave the day-to-day administrative tasks to us, allowing you to focus on scaling your business to greater heights.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Lehigh Acres, Florida even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Lehigh Acres. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Florida.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Lehigh Acres virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Lakewood Ranch?
sections.body: Lakewood Ranch is more than just a desirable residential community; it’s also a burgeoning hub for businesses in diverse sectors like technology, healthcare, and real estate. Our strategically located office in Lakewood Ranch makes networking easy, connecting you to key industry players and essential events.  Opting for an Opus Virtual Office in Lakewood Ranch isn’t just about cost-saving—it’s about gaining an invaluable edge over your competitors. Ready to take your business to the next level? Our premier virtual office services are here to aid you in your ascent.  Opus VO, Lakewood Ranch @ [1446 Lee Blvd, Lehigh Acres, FL 33936
